sentence.Network_en: The Government of Jamaica consider it imprudent to abolish the death penalty.
sentence.Network_cn: 牙买加政府认为废除死刑是轻率之举。

sentence.Network_en: It would be imprudent to invest all your money in one company.
sentence.Network_cn: 把所有的钱都投资在一家公司是不明智的。

sentence.Network_en: It would be imprudent of you to make enemies of those who can help you.
sentence.Network_cn: 与能帮助你的人为敌将是不明智的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 银行业术语-英文 - MBA智库文档 ... prudential rules 审慎规则 imprudent 轻率的，鲁莽的 supplant 排挤掉，代替.
银行业术语-英文 - MBA智库文档 ... prudential rules 审慎规则 imprudent 轻率的，鲁莽的 supplant 排挤掉，代替.
★2010年7月5日SAT词汇精选[3]-SAT-无忧考网 ... haughty 高傲自大的 imprudent 不谨慎的轻率的 loquacious 爱说话的多说话的.
SAT Official Guide V-Mate ... debilitate 使衰弱 imprudent 轻率的,不明智的 denude 【地质学】剥蚀.

list.abs: I told him that I thought it would be imprudent ., 我告诉他我认为那样做将是轻率的.
Lack of wisdom ; imprudence or recklessness ., 轻率缺乏智慧 ; 轻率或鲁莽.
So what should I do about those imprudent things I said about the Senior VP ?, 那么对于我说的那些有关副总裁的轻率的话 , 我该怎么办呢?
Consumers need financial education to protect themselves from any imprudent business ., 消费者需要的金融教育 , 保护自己 , 避免任何轻率的业务.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin imprudent- 'not foreseeing', from in- 'not' + prudent- (see prudent)

entry.def: If you describe someone's behaviour as imprudent, you think it is not sensible or carefully thought out.

example.ex: The Government of Jamaica consider it imprudent to abolish the death penalty.
example.tran: 牙买加政府认为废除死刑是轻率之举。

sentences.sentence: "very imprudent of her mother to encourage her in such silly romantic ideas"
"would be imprudent for a noneconomist to talk about the details of economic policy"- A.M.Schlesinger

auth_sentence.content: It would be imprudent not to be very concerned and worried about it.
auth_sentence.res_content: It would be imprudent not to be very concerned and worried about it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It would be imprudent not to be very concerned and worried about it.

auth_sentence.content: But to associate themselves, however rhetorically, with bin Laden certainly seems imprudent.
auth_sentence.res_content: But to associate themselves, however rhetorically, with bin Laden certainly seems imprudent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But to associate themselves, however rhetorically, with bin Laden certainly seems imprudent.

auth_sentence.content: The sense that, perhaps, it was imprudent to take a cab or drink a bottle of wine, added a zest to those enjoyments.
auth_sentence.res_content: The sense that, perhaps, it was imprudent to take a cab or drink a bottle of wine, added a zest to those enjoyments.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The sense that, perhaps, it was imprudent to take a cab or drink a bottle of wine, added a zest to those enjoyments.

means.word_mean: 不明智的, 不谨慎的

sentences.en: It would be imprudent of you to make enemies of those who can help you.
sentences.cn: 与能帮助你的人为敌将是不明智的。
